Symbol.Script_2D:
pen gs_cont_pen
CALL "Resize_A_B_ZZYZX" Parameters ALL
! Minimal space add2 -0.05, -0.05 call "fa_minimalspace_Be_WMCC" parameters all A = A + 0.10, MSType = 2, diff2 = 0, diff3 = MSSide, unID = 3000 del 1
hotspot2 a/2,b hotspot2 a/2,b/2
LINE2 2", 3.5", 2", b-3.5" LINE2 -2", 3.5", -2", b-3.5" LINE2 -2", b-3.5", 2", b-3.5" LINE2 -2", 3.5", 2", 3.5" LINE2 -1.4451", b-2.629", -2", b-3.5" LINE2 1.4693", b-2.629", 2", b-3.5" LINE2 -1.4451", 2.6290", -2", 3.5" LINE2 1.4693", 2.6155", 2", 3.5"
CIRCLE2 0, 0, 3" CIRCLE2 0, b, 3" CIRCLE2 a, b, 3" CIRCLE2 a, 0, 3"
LINE2 2.6189", 1.4633", 3.5", 2" LINE2 2.6189", -1.4633", 3.5", -2" LINE2 a-2.6189", 1.4633", a-3.5", 1.9890" LINE2 a-2.6189", -1.4633", a-3.5", -1.9890" LINE2 3.5", 2", 3.5", -2" LINE2 a-3.5", 2", a-3.5", -2" LINE2 3.5", 2", a-3.5", 2" LINE2 3.5", -2", a-3.5", -2"
LINE2 2.6189", b-1.4633", 3.5", b-2" LINE2 2.6189", b+1.4633", 3.5", b+2" LINE2 a-2.6189", b-1.4633", a-3.5", b-2" LINE2 a-2.6189", b+1.4633", a-3.5", b+2" LINE2 3.5", b+2", 3.5", b-2" LINE2 a-3.5", b+2", a-3.5", b-2" LINE2 3.5000", b+2", a-3.5", b+2" LINE2 3.5000", b-2", a-3.5", b-2"
LINE2 a-1.4451", b-2.629", a-2", b-3.5" LINE2 a+1.4693", b-2.629", a+2", b-3.5" LINE2 a-1.4451", 2.6290", a-2", 3.5" LINE2 a+1.4693", 2.6155", a+2", 3.5" LINE2 a-2", b-3.5", a+2", b-3.5" LINE2 a-2", 3.5", a+2", 3.5" LINE2 a+2", 3.5", a+2", b-3.5" LINE2 a-2", 3.5", a-2", b-3.5"
ARC2 6", b-6", 4", 90.0, 180.0 ARC2 6", 6", 4", 180.0, 270.0 ARC2 a-6", 6", 4", 270.0, 0.0 ARC2 a-6", b-6", 4", 0.0, 90.0
!!! ******************************** Different fills if bUniformFill then fillTypeBed = fillTypeUniform fillPenBed = fillPenUniform backPenBed = backPenUniform fillTypePillow = fillTypeUniform fillPenPillow = fillPenUniform backPenPillow = backPenUniform fillTypeBlanket = fillTypeUniform fillPenBlanket = fillPenUniform backPenBlanket = backPenUniform iContour = 1 else fillTypeBed = gs_fill_type fillPenBed = gs_fill_pen backPenBed = gs_back_pen iContour = 7 endif reducer = bd / 2 +0.01
fill fillTypeBed drawindex 10 poly2_b 20, 1+2+4,fillPenBed,backPenBed, 3.5", -2", 1, a-3.5", -2", 1, a-2.6189", -1.4633", 1, a, 0, 901, 0, 212.009, 4001, a+2", 3.5", 1, a+2", b-3.5", 1, a+1.4633", b-2.6189", 1, a, b, 901, 0, 212.009, 4001, a-3.5", b+2", 1, 3.5", b+2", 1, 2.6189", b+1.4633", 1, 0, b, 901, 0, 212.009, 4001, -2", b-3.5", 1, -2", 3.5", 1, -1.4633", 2.6189", 1, 0, 0, 901, 0, 212.009, 4001
IF iSymbolType = 3 THEN ! Type 3 LINE2 a-reducer, reducer, a/2, b-reducer LINE2 reducer, reducer, a/2, b-reducer endif
IF iSymbolType = 2 THEN ! Type 2 fill fillTypePillow drawindex 20 POLY2_B 5, iContour, fillPenPillow, backPenPillow, 0.06+reducer, b-0.48, 1, a/2-0.06, b-0.48, 1, a/2-0.06, b-0.06-reducer, 1, 0.06+reducer, b-0.06-reducer, 1, 0.06+reducer, b-0.48, -1
ADD2 a/2, 0
POLY2_B 5, iContour, fillPenPillow, backPenPillow, 0.06, b-0.48, 1, a/2-0.06-reducer, b-0.48, 1, a/2-0.06-reducer, b-0.06-reducer, 1, 0.06, b-0.06-reducer, 1, 0.06, b-0.48, -1 DEL 1 ENDIF
IF iSymbolType = 1 THEN ! Type 1 ADD2 a/2, 0 mm=1 GOSUB 110 mm=-1 GOSUB 110 DEl 1 ENDIF
END
!---------------->!!! RETURN !!!<----------------
110: fill fillTypePillow drawindex 20
POLY2_B 6, iContour, fillPenPillow, backPenPillow, mm*(0.06), b-0.44, 1, mm*(0.06), b-0.06-reducer, 1, mm*(a/2-0.06-reducer), b-0.06-reducer, 1, mm*(a/2-0.06-reducer), b-0.48, 1, mm*(a/2-0.17-reducer), b-0.48, 1, mm*(a/2-0.21-reducer), b-0.44, 1
drawindex 30 fill fillTypeBlanket
POLY2_B 6, iContour, fillPenBlanket, backPenBlanket, 0, 0.03+reducer, 1, mm*(a/2-0.03-reducer), 0.03+reducer, 1, mm*(a/2-0.03-reducer), b-0.62, 1, mm*(a/2-0.21-reducer), b-0.44, 1, 0, b-0.44, 0, 0, 0.03+reducer, -1 LINE2 mm*(a/2-0.03-reducer), b-0.62, mm*(a/2-0.21-reducer), b-0.62 LINE2 mm*(a/2-0.21-reducer), b-0.44, mm*(a/2-0.21-reducer), b-0.62 RETURN
Symbol.Script_1D:
! const values for parameter: iNumPillows NUMPILLOW_NONE = 0 NUMPILLOW_ONE = 1 NUMPILLOW_TWO = 2
! const values for parameter: iBedLogType BEDLOG_SOFT = 1 BEDLOG_RUSTIC = 2
! const values for parameter: gs_detlevel_3D_m DLEV3D_OFF = 0 DLEV3D_SIMPLE = 1 DLEV3D_DETAILED = 2 DLEV3D_DRAFT = 3
dim stSymbolTypes[4] stSymbolTypes[1] = `Type 1` stSymbolTypes[2] = `Type 2` stSymbolTypes[3] = `Type 3` stSymbolTypes[4] = `Type 4`
dim stFillFor[3] stFillFor[1] = `Bed` stFillFor[2] = `Pillow` stFillFor[3] = `Blanket`
tempzzyzx=zzyzx if zzyzx<50" then zzyzx=50"
tempbd=bd if bd<3/4" then bd=3/4"
templdm=ldm if ldm<1" then ldm=1"
tempbdm=bdm if bdm<1/2" then bd=1/2"
if a-2*bd<24" then iNumPillows = NUMPILLOW_NONE parameters iNumPillows = iNumPillows endif
If iBedLogType = BEDLOG_SOFT then ltp = 1 If iBedLogType = BEDLOG_RUSTIC then ltp = 2
Symbol.Script_VL:
call "FM_types_Be_WMCC" parameters all
if gs_ui_current_page > 2 then gs_ui_current_page = 2 parameters gs_ui_current_page = gs_ui_current_page endif
CALL "ui_tabcontrol" parameters controlType = 1, nTabs = 2, gs_ui_current_page = gs_ui_current_page
values{2} "iBedLogType" BEDLOG_SOFT, `Soft`, BEDLOG_RUSTIC, `Rustic` values{2} "iNumPillows" NUMPILLOW_NONE, `without Pillow`, NUMPILLOW_ONE, `One Pillow`, NUMPILLOW_TWO, `Two Pillows` values{2} "gs_detlevel_3D_m" DLEV3D_DETAILED, `Detailed`, DLEV3D_SIMPLE, `Simple`, DLEV3D_OFF, `Off` VALUES "gs_resol" RANGE [3,)
IF gs_cont_pen=0 THEN PARAMETERS gs_cont_pen=4 IF gs_fill_pen=0 THEN PARAMETERS gs_fill_pen=19
IF tempzzyzx<50" THEN PARAMETERS zzyzx=50" IF templdm<1" THEN PARAMETERS ldm=1" IF tempbdm<1/2" THEN PARAMETERS bdm=1/2" IF tempbd<3/4" THEN PARAMETERS bd=3/4"
IF iNumPillows = NUMPILLOW_NONE THEN HIDEPARAMETER "pillow_mat"
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = DLEV3D_SIMPLE THEN HIDEPARAMETER "gs_resol" IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = DLEV3D_OFF THEN HIDEPARAMETER "gs_resol", "gs_shadow"
! --- Minimal Space ---
if MSFront < 0 then MSFront = 0 parameters MSFront = MSFront endif if MSSide < 0 then MSSide = 0 parameters MSSide = MSSide endif if MSLength < 0 then MSLength = 0 parameters MSLength = MSLength endif if MSSide2 < 0 then MSSide2 = 0 parameters MSSide2 = MSSide2 endif
!!! ******************************** Different fills if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "fillFor" then iFillFor = 1 for i = 1 to vardim1(stFillFor) if fillFor = stFillFor[i] then iFillFor = i next i parameters iFillFor = iFillFor else iFillFor = max(min(iFillFor,3),1) parameters fillFor = stFillFor[iFillFor] endif
if fillPenUniform=0 then parameters fillPenUniform=19 if fillPenPillow=0 then parameters fillPenPillow=19 if fillPenBlanket=0 then parameters fillPenBlanket=19
if iSymbolType = 1 or iSymbolType = 2 then if iSymbolType = 1 then values "fillFor" stFillFor values "iFillFor" 1, 2, 3 endif if iSymbolType = 2 then values "fillFor" stFillFor[1], stFillFor[2] values "iFillFor" 1, 2 hideparameter "fillTypeBlanket", "fillPenBlanket", "backPenBlanket" lock "fillTypeBlanket", "fillPenBlanket", "backPenBlanket" endif else values "fillFor" stFillFor[1] values "iFillFor" 1 lock "fillFor", "iFillFor" hideparameter "fillFor", "iFillFor" hideparameter "fillTypePillow", "fillPenPillow", "backPenPillow", "fillTypeBlanket", "fillPenBlanket", "backPenBlanket" lock "fillTypePillow", "fillPenPillow", "backPenPillow", "fillTypeBlanket", "fillPenBlanket", "backPenBlanket" endif
if bUniformFill then lock "fillFor", "iFillFor" hideparameter "fillFor", "iFillFor" hideparameter "fillTypePillow", "fillPenPillow", "backPenPillow", "fillTypeBlanket", "fillPenBlanket", "backPenBlanket", "gs_fill_type", "gs_fill_pen", "gs_back_pen" lock "fillTypePillow", "fillPenPillow", "backPenPillow", "fillTypeBlanket", "fillPenBlanket", "backPenBlanket", "gs_fill_type", "gs_fill_pen", "gs_back_pen" else hideparameter "fillTypeUniform", "fillPenUniform", "backPenUniform" lock "fillTypeUniform", "fillPenUniform", "backPenUniform" endif
! ----- 2D Symbol Type ----- values "styp" stSymbolTypes ! Type 1(1),Type 2(2),Type 3(3),Type 4(4) values "iSymbolType" 1, 2, 3, 4 if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "styp" then iSymbolType = 1 for i = 1 to vardim1(stSymbolTypes) if styp= stSymbolTypes[i] then iSymbolType = i next i parameters iSymbolType = iSymbolType else iSymbolType = max(min(iSymbolType,4),1) parameters styp= stSymbolTypes[iSymbolType] endif
Symbol.Keywords: Log styles, pillows, different 2D fills, 2D symbols, minimal space
Symbol.Script_UI:
dim tabTitles[2] tabTitles[1] = `Appearance` tabTitles[2] = `Minimal Space`
dim tabIcons[2] tabIcons[1] = "ui_tab_furniture_appearance(1)" tabIcons[2] = "ui_tab_minimalspace(1)"
FILE_DEPENDENCE "ui_tab_furniture_appearance(1)" FILE_DEPENDENCE "ui_tab_minimalspace(1)"
dim stBedSettingsUI[15] stBedSettingsUI[1] = `Bed Settings` stBedSettingsUI[2] = `2D Representation` stBedSettingsUI[3] = `3D Representation` stBedSettingsUI[4] = `Resolution` stBedSettingsUI[5] = `Contour Pen` stBedSettingsUI[6] = `Fill Type` stBedSettingsUI[7] = `Fill Pen` stBedSettingsUI[8] = `Background Pen` stBedSettingsUI[9] = `Minimal Space` stBedSettingsUI[10] = `On Sides` stBedSettingsUI[11] = `Symbol Type` stBedSettingsUI[12] = `3D` stBedSettingsUI[13] = `Shadow` stBedSettingsUI[14] = `Uniform Fill Settings` stBedSettingsUI[15] = `Fill for`
dim stToolTips[10] stToolTips[1] = `Bed Width` stToolTips[2] = `Bed Length` stToolTips[3] = `Minimal Space in Front` stToolTips[4] = `Minimal Space Width 1 on Side 1` stToolTips[5] = `Minimal Space Width 2 on Side 1` stToolTips[6] = `Minimal Space on Side 2` stToolTips[7] = `Minimal Space Length 1` stToolTips[8] = `Minimal Space Length 2` stToolTips[9] = `Minimal Space on Side 1` stToolTips[10] = `Minimal Space Length`
! ====================================================================== ui_dialog stBedSettingsUI[1],444,266 ! Bed Settings ui_current_page gs_ui_current_page ui_page gs_ui_current_page
CALL "ui_tabcontrol" parameters controlType = 1, nTabs = vardim1(tabTitles), gs_ui_current_page = gs_ui_current_page, tabTitles = tabTitles, tabIcons = tabIcons
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! *** Page 1 *** !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ui_page 1
InfieldHgt=20 ! height of Infield fillInfieldHgt = 24 ! height of Fill OufieldHgt=16 ! height of SepDistY x1 = 10 x2 = 100 x3 = 230 x4 = 347 x5 = 392 x6 = 265 x7 = 180 x8 = 280 x9 = 362 x10 = 442
UI_SEPARATOR x6+7, 35, x6+7, 260
UI_STYLE 0, 1 UI_OUTFIELD stBedSettingsUI[2], x1, 35, 215-x1, 15 ! 2D Representation UI_STYLE 0, 0
pos_y1=30
yCurrent = 56 + 27
UI_OUTFIELD stBedSettingsUI[5], x2, yCurrent, x3-x2-2, OufieldHgt ! Contour Pen UI_INFIELD "gs_cont_pen", x3, yCurrent-4, x6-x3, InfieldHgt yCurrent = yCurrent +27
ui_infield{3} "bUniformFill", x2, yCurrent-2, x6-x2+5, 35, 7, "", 2, 1, 20, 20, 20, 20, 0, stBedSettingsUI[14], 0, ! Uniform Fill Settings 1, stBedSettingsUI[14], 1 yCurrent = yCurrent +40
if not(bUniformFill) then iFlag = 4 * not((iSymbolType = 1 and not(bUniformFill)) or (iSymbolType = 2 and not(bUniformFill))) UI_OUTFIELD stBedSettingsUI[15], x2, yCurrent, x7-x2-2, OufieldHgt, iFlag ! Fill for if iSymbolType = 1 or iSymbolType = 2 then if iSymbolType = 1 then UI_INFIELD{3} "iFillFor", x7, yCurrent-4, x6-x7, InfieldHgt, 8, "", 3, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, stFillFor[1], 1, 2, stFillFor[2], 2, 3, stFillFor[3], 3 ui_tooltip stBedSettingsUI[15] endif if iSymbolType = 2 then UI_INFIELD{3} "iFillFor", x7, yCurrent-4, x6-x7, InfieldHgt, 8, "", 2, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, stFillFor[1], 1, 2, stFillFor[2], 2 ui_tooltip stBedSettingsUI[15] endif else UI_INFIELD{3} "iFillFor", x7, yCurrent-4, x6-x7, InfieldHgt, 8, "", 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, stFillFor[1], 1 ui_tooltip stBedSettingsUI[15] endif yCurrent = yCurrent +27 endif
UI_OUTFIELD stBedSettingsUI[6], x2, yCurrent, x7-x2-2, OufieldHgt ! Fill Type if bUniformFill then UI_INFIELD "fillTypeUniform", x7, yCurrent-4, x6-x7, fillInfieldHgt ! Uniform Fill Type else if iFillFor = 1 then UI_INFIELD "gs_fill_type", x7, yCurrent-4, x6-x7, fillInfieldHgt ! Bed Fill Type if iFillFor = 2 then UI_INFIELD "fillTypePillow", x7, yCurrent-4, x6-x7, fillInfieldHgt ! Pillow Fill Type if iFillFor = 3 then UI_INFIELD "fillTypeBlanket", x7, yCurrent-4, x6-x7, fillInfieldHgt ! Blanket Fill Type endif yCurrent = yCurrent +27
UI_OUTFIELD stBedSettingsUI[7], x2, yCurrent, x3-x2-2, OufieldHgt ! Fill Pen if bUniformFill then UI_INFIELD "fillPenUniform", x3, yCurrent-4, x6-x3, InfieldHgt ! Uniform Fill Pen else if iFillFor = 1 then UI_INFIELD "gs_fill_pen", x3, yCurrent-4, x6-x3, InfieldHgt ! Bed Fill Pen if iFillFor = 2 then UI_INFIELD "fillPenPillow", x3, yCurrent-4, x6-x3, InfieldHgt ! Pillow Fill Pen if iFillFor = 3 then UI_INFIELD "fillPenBlanket", x3, yCurrent-4, x6-x3, InfieldHgt ! Blanket Fill Pen endif yCurrent = yCurrent +27
UI_OUTFIELD stBedSettingsUI[8], x2, yCurrent, x3-x2-2, OufieldHgt ! Background Pen if bUniformFill then UI_INFIELD "backPenUniform", x3, yCurrent-4, x6-x3, InfieldHgt ! Uniform Background Pen else if iFillFor = 1 then UI_INFIELD "gs_back_pen", x3, yCurrent-4, x6-x3, InfieldHgt ! Bed Background Pen if iFillFor = 2 then UI_INFIELD "backPenPillow", x3, yCurrent-4, x6-x3, InfieldHgt ! Pillow Background Pen if iFillFor = 3 then UI_INFIELD "backPenBlanket", x3, yCurrent-4, x6-x3, InfieldHgt ! Blanket Background Pen endif
UI_OUTFIELD stBedSettingsUI[11], x1, 56, 215-x1, OufieldHgt ! Symbol Type
ui_infield{2} "styp",12,74,82,90, 3,"2DstypD70(13)",4,2, 82,90,77,85, 4, stSymbolTypes[1], ! Type 1 3, stSymbolTypes[2], ! Type 2 2, stSymbolTypes[3], ! Type 3 1, stSymbolTypes[4] ! Type 4
UI_STYLE 0, 1 UI_OUTFIELD stBedSettingsUI[3], x8, 35, x10-x8, 15 ! 3D Representation UI_STYLE 0, 0
yCurrent = 56 + 27
UI_OUTFIELD stBedSettingsUI[12], x8, yCurrent, x9-x8-2, OufieldHgt ! Detail Level UI_INFIELD{3} "gs_detlevel_3D_m", x9, yCurrent-4, x10-x9, InfieldHgt yCurrent = yCurrent +27
UI_OUTFIELD stBedSettingsUI[4], x8, yCurrent, x9-x8-2, OufieldHgt ! Resolution UI_INFIELD "gs_resol", x9, yCurrent-4, x10-x9, InfieldHgt yCurrent = yCurrent +27
UI_INFIELD{3} "gs_shadow", x8, yCurrent, x10-x8, OufieldHgt, 7, "", 2, 1, 20, 20, 20, 20, 0, stBedSettingsUI[13], 0, 1, stBedSettingsUI[13], 1
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! *** Page 2 *** !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ui_page 2
xxPict = 106 yyPict = 68
ImageX=231 ImageY=161
UI_PICT 2, xxPict, yyPict, ImageX, ImageY, 1
UI_INFIELD "B", xxPict+ImageX+5, yyPict+53, 70, 18 UI_TOOLTIP stToolTips[2] ! --- Bed Length UI_INFIELD "MSSide", xxPict+2, yyPict+ImageY+5, 70, 18 UI_TOOLTIP stToolTips[9] ! --- Min. Space on Side 1 UI_INFIELD "A", xxPict+93, yyPict+ImageY+5, 70, 18 UI_TOOLTIP stToolTips[1] ! --- Bed Width UI_INFIELD "MSSide2", xxPict+172, yyPict+ImageY+5, 70, 18 UI_TOOLTIP stToolTips[6] ! --- Min. Space on Side 2 UI_INFIELD "MSLength", xxPict-75, yyPict+77, 70, 18 UI_TOOLTIP stToolTips[10] ! --- Min. Space Length UI_INFIELD "MSFront", xxPict-75, yyPict+126, 70, 18 UI_TOOLTIP stToolTips[3] ! --- Min. Space in Front

Symbol.Script_BWM:
targetGUID = TO_GUID
! ============================================================================== ! Subroutines ! ==============================================================================
gosub "fmtypes_bwm"
gosub "dlev3d_Beds_bwm"
gosub "log_type_bwm"
! ============================================================================== ! Set Migration GUID ! ==============================================================================
setmigrationguid targetGUID
! ============================================================================== end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! en ! ==============================================================================
! ============================================================================== ! Change string parameter to integer ! ============================================================================== "dlev3d_Beds_bwm": if targetGUID # "" then newparameter "gs_detlevel_3D", "String" gs_detlevel_3D = `Off` if gs_detlevel_3D_m = DLEV3D_SIMPLE then gs_detlevel_3D = `Simple` if gs_detlevel_3D_m = DLEV3D_DETAILED then gs_detlevel_3D = `Detailed` if gs_detlevel_3D_m = DLEV3D_DRAFT then gs_detlevel_3D = `Draft` parameters gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D
endif return
! ============================================================================== ! Change string parameter to integer ! ============================================================================== "log_type_bwm": if targetGUID # "" then newparameter "log_type", "String" log_type = `Soft` if iBedLogType = BEDLOG_RUSTIC then log_type = `Rustic` parameters log_type = log_type
newparameter "nop", "String" nop = `without Pillow` if iNumPillows = NUMPILLOW_ONE then nop = `One Pillow` if iNumPillows = NUMPILLOW_TWO then nop = `Two Pillows` parameters nop = nop
endif return
! ============================================================================== ! Change string parameter to integer ! ============================================================================== "fmtypes_bwm": if targetGUID # "" then if iFMType = 1 then FM_Type = `Default Objects` if iFMType = 2 then FM_Type = `Default Lamps` if iFMType = 3 then FM_Type = `People` if iFMType = 4 then FM_Type = `Elevators` if iFMType = 5 then FM_Type = `Security and Escapes` if iFMType = 6 then FM_Type = `Stairs` if iFMType = 7 then FM_Type = `Work Spaces` if iFMType = 8 then FM_Type = `Electric Facilities` if iFMType = 9 then FM_Type = `Distribution Panels` if iFMType = 10 then FM_Type = `Measuring Places` if iFMType = 11 then FM_Type = `Lamps` if iFMType = 12 then FM_Type = `HVAC Equipment` if iFMType = 13 then FM_Type = `Sanitation` if iFMType = 14 then FM_Type = `Locks` if iFMType = 15 then FM_Type = `Built-in Wardrobes` if iFMType = 16 then FM_Type = `Furniture` if iFMType = 17 then FM_Type = `Ceilings` if iFMType = 18 then FM_Type = `Floors` if iFMType = 19 then FM_Type = `Outdoor Objects` if iFMType = 20 then FM_Type = `Computers` if iFMType = 21 then FM_Type = `Monitors` if iFMType = 22 then FM_Type = `Software` if iFMType = 23 then FM_Type = `Phones` if iFMType = 24 then FM_Type = `Containers` if iFMType = 25 then FM_Type = `Others` parameters FM_Type = FM_Type
endif return
